defaultMessage: Without them, you will have to return to the Origin marketplace to know if your offer is accepted or when the seller leaves you a review.
Without them, you will have to return to the Origin marketplace to know when a buyer makes an offer on your listing or leaves you a review.
Because the Origin marketplace is fully-decentralized, you won't receive any emails when there is something important to tell you. You are likely to miss important updates about your transactions.
